text:
(Positioning is fine... and I've figured out the camera
angle, so now it's about how to make an impression...)

(...Should I try holding the ribbon and moving it like
wings? Or maybe coordinate it with a jump...?)

(...But then again, having something more straightforward,
like a fan service move, might be better...)

Ah, I'm sorry, Producer-san!
I wasn't ignoring you, I swear...!

Haha, I know. You were really focused. Just make sure
to get ready to leave once you've calmed down, alright?

Y-Yes...!
Understood, thank you very much...!
